attributes.action: Open university online course to protect students and teachers
attributes.additional_details: There is a petition about shut down shcool. But its impossible to achieve，and it will cause huge finance break down. But if change the class into online or pre recorded classes vedio？This will not only protect us from disease，but make this year study life more effective.
attributes.background: Should ask University to offer online course and online assessment. So even students are afraid of virus，it will be a way for us to continue the studying.

rejection.details:
Decisions about how to run classes are a matter for individual educational institutions.

We have published two petitions calling for the Government to close educational institutions.

One petition calls for schools/colleges to be closed for an appropriate amount of time: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300403

One petition calls for universities to be closed for an appropriate amount of time: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300628
